title: Coach LFT Free Agent Open to Offers
body:
Previous Abyss White Head Coach, and Coaching Staff at Abyss Esports

Experience Split 1 of 2016 Challenger Series

Open To Trials


Skype: Shivneel32
IGN: Abyss Templar , Wolves

replies.body: new team incoming add me if you want to try out as analyst/coach
Enjoyed our battles last year, Abyss White vs Paragon White.... that Nautilus flex pick your idea mate? :)
Unless you want 1000 Nigerian princes blowing up your inbox, I would suggest leaving your email off the post for now and ask that people add your ingame for further contact information ♥
